channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: The owner of a Swiss bar, Jacques Moretti, was detained after a New Year's Day fire killed 40 people and injured 116 others. His wife Jessica, who is also the co-owner of the bar, was not detained. #CransMontana #SkiResort #Switzerland #BBCNews

item.title: People took to the streets of Minneapolis and other US cities for a second night to protest against the killing of 37-year-old Renee Nicole Good, who was shot in her car by a US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agent. #ReneeGood #ICE #Minneapolis

item.title: A video filmed by the US immigration agent who fatally shot a woman in Minneapolis on Wednesday has emerged, showing the moments before gunfire rang out. The footage shows Renee Nicole Good sitting behind the wheel of her car and speaking to the officer.
item.description: A video filmed by the US immigration agent who fatally shot a woman in Minneapolis on Wednesday has emerged, showing the moments before gunfire rang out. The footage shows Renee Nicole Good sitting behind the wheel of her car and speaking to the officer.
